item.title: دعم العربية في الطرفية
item.description: دعم اللغة العربية في الطرفية يتيح عرض النصوص العربية بشكل صحيح مع الحفاظ على اتجاه الكتابة من اليمين لليسار، مما يحسن تجربة المستخدمين الناطقين بالعربية في بيئات التشغيل المختلفة.

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there! I’m Baraa sayed, a recent graduate in computer science and a budding web developer with a love for Linux and open-source tech. I’ve always been fascinated by the inner workings of the web, which led me to dive into coding. I’m particularly drawn to Linux and open-source software for their collaborative spirit and flexibility. With skills in ReactJs, NodeJs, ExpressJs, and MongoDB, I’m eager to take on projects that challenge me to grow as a developer.

item.title: Projects
item.description: ARMS-system # React JavaScript Git MongoDB GitHub Academic Review Management System (ARMS) is a fullstack Dashboard built with a consistent nice UI using React and Redux for Front-end and ExpressJs for backend along side MongoDB as a Database ProgHub # React JavaScript Git SQLite GitHub A fullstack social media website built with Auth React with Typescript and Chakra UI as component library for Front-end and ExpressTS and SQLite for backend Wordle Clone # React JavaScript
